price: 3. Kaadu diggah ni Rabbih nabna fayya itteeh, usuk barra ma haysitinnaay, xalay ma haysitinna iyyen.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
